title: KateyKhaos is gone from Ask.FM!
body: Kateykhaos, I'm gonna miss reading your questions! You gave so much insight into the development and behind the scenes of the skins team!

replies.body:
Heyo! 

I won't be gone forever - I promise! 

With a wedding & honeymoon coming up in a little over a month, as well as a vacation next week, I don't have a ton of spare time at the moment. Aaaand the free time that I do have is dedicated to finishing up some odds and ends for the wedding.

I disabled the account so that people aren't asking questions and not getting answers. I'd feel bad not replying. ;_; 

Sooo yeah, I'll bring it back after all the festivities are over with and I have a bit more free time! :D

It's nice to hear that someone's reading and appreciating the answers, though. <3

Congratulations again! ^_^

Can we share the happyness and see some pics? I'd love to see the dress, and if and how you included LoL in the celebration :D
Thanks! I'd be happy to share some pictures, if you guys would like to see some of the LoL stuff. :3
Will the flowers be Ward shaped or Poro?
Just normal flowers, but the tables are named after champions. :D
didn't notice when this was put out. sorry.

It's been 7 months are you still busy? ;c and if you do happened to read this I wanted to ask why did an ursine attack Lissandra and make her blind

OMFG! CONGRATULATIONS! Weddings are amazingly fun and I hope you rock that dress! Have a fun honeymoon too!

Happy wedding, or merry wedding?

Is it a Nami dress or a Sona dress?
Thanks! I'd tried on a mermaid dress, but it wasn't my jam. I'd opted for something a bit more ballgown like Sona. :D
